#summary CHOP Fetal twin-twin transfusion syndrome / cardiovascular profile score  calculator

== Introduction ==
This is my online calculator version of the scoring system presented in:

Rychik J, Tian Z, Bebbington M, et al.
 
The twin-twin transfusion syndrome: spectrum of cardiovascular abnormality and development of a cardiovascular score to assess severity of disease.
 
Am J Obstet Gynecol 2007;197:392.e1-392.e8.

  * [http://parameterz.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CHOP-CVScore/CHOP_TTTS.htm CHOP Fetal CV Profile Score]
